title: Transgender Student Wins Civil Rights Battle
itunes:title: Transgender Student Wins Civil Rights Battle
description:
Katherine Franke, a professor at Columbia Law School, discusses the Supreme Court refusing to question the rights of transgender students to use school bathrooms that correspond with their gender identity, rejecting an appeal in a long-running civil rights battle.

Jennifer Rie, Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Litigation Analyst, discusses why Facebook's antitrust win is likely short-lived.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
